Skills Competency Award - Web Programming

DEPARTMENT REQUIREMENTS (COMPLETE 16 - 16.5 UNITS) CLASS UNITS
CIS 230 - Active Server Pages & VB Script or4 units
CS 125 - C# Programming and3 units
CS 127 - ASP.net using C#1.5 units
CS 111 - HTML and Webmastering3 units
CS 115 - JavaScript and Dynamic HTML3 units
CS 116 - Web Server Programming3 units
CS 105 - Theory and Practice I or3 units
CS 120 - Java Programming3 units

*NOTE: Students must complete the above courses with a grade of "C" or higher or credit in all courses.

For further information, contact the Counseling Center, 954-0581 ext. 2285, or Dr. Dean Nevins, Department Chair, (805) 730-5191
